page.title: 16NORTH SEA GAS AT NEWTON.
page.content:
There is no gas supply to this block but at the beginning of this decade a huge North Sea Gas pipeline was taken across the area.It caused great consternation among some local people who imagined possible gas escapes.It was amazing to realise how medieval were some of their fears and I was tempted into verse.
O mighty one!Dragon,long and yellow, Passing unseen under my feet! I tremble at your power hidden below And beg you,flame only at the seat Of all your mouths away from here! Let not escape your gassy breath Into this rural air for fear I have that it may be my death!
